If you wish to receive immunization reminder and recall communication electronically (via text and email), please complete the [Electronic Notification Opt-In Form](https://ndhealth.co1.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_88R8NtlKYkqPCg6). If you no longer wish to receive any reminder and recall communication, please complete the [Recall Exclusion Form. ](https://ndhealth.co1.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_2ay5dZcIwLK7j3U) [ ]() Influenza Reminders During each influenza season, the immunization unit sends letters to parents of kids under the age of 9 who need to receive a second dose of influenza vaccine for the current season. Additionally, the immunization program sends reminder postcards to parents of kids 6 months through 17 years who need a dose of influenza vaccine for the current season.
